title: The Dragon Master Swain chromas are pretty underwhelming imo
body:
So... all Chroma Skin releases in the past few months were pretty amazing. It felt like the color schemes completely changed the skin, and there was a clear differentiation between the base and the Chromas.
But the new DM Swain ones.. meh. I hope they'll be further polished before release.

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

As Riot Orphyre mentioned in the chromas [PBE thread](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/client-new-features-feedback/FrEY1VXd-pbe-bugs-feedback-thread-dragon-master-swain-and-badlands-baron-rumble) - 

*EDIT: Based on your feedback across many channels and our own reviews, we've decided to ship Dragon Master Swain Chromas at a later date--we plan to spend a bit more time on him to improve, and to make sure they meet yours and our expectations for really great Chromas*

*Badlands Baron Rumble Chromas will still go out this patch!*

If you have any specific feedback, please post it here and I can relay the message. :)
